text: Sharon Lee is an American Democratic politician. In January 2020, she became the acting borough president of Queens. Lee was appointed deputy borough president in November 2018. Lee took over as borough president from Melinda Katz in January 2020, who was elected Queens District Attorney in 2019. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Queens borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Sharon Lee (politician)
